name: Darkness in the Room
description:
Welcome to Darkness in the Room!

STORY:

You just moved into an old house. The people who last lived in it had died mysteriously and no one knew why.  Upon opening the door to the basement, a dark creature burst into the room, and you must escape before is destroys you. You managed to grab a rifle from your safe, but it is jammed. Wait 2 minutes to start firing.

CONTROLS:

WASD or arrows to move, spacebar to shoot when your rifle is not jammed.
